resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

certificateFileName.name: certificateFileName
certificateFileName.description: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.
certificateFileName.ai_hint: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.

certificateFormat.name: certificateFormat
certificateFormat.description: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange.
certificateFormat.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

certificateType.name: certificateType

options.name: Root-CA
options.description: You must specify the key file name. The generated Root-CA certificate can be used for signing end-user client or server certificates or to create Intermediate-CA certificates.

options.name: Server
options.description: SSL server certificate used on SSL servers for end-to-end encryption

options.name: Client
options.description: End-user client certificate used for client authentication

certificateType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

certificateRequestFileName.name: certificateRequestFileName
certificateRequestFileName.description: Name for and, optionally, path to the certificate-signing request (CSR). /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.
certificateRequestFileName.ai_hint: Name for and, optionally, path to the certificate-signing request (CSR). /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.

caCertificateFileName.name: caCertificateFileName
caCertificateFileName.description: Name of the CA certificate file that issues and signs the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificates
caCertificateFileName.ai_hint: Name of the CA certificate file that issues and signs the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificates

caCertificateFileFormat.name: caCertificateFileFormat
caCertificateFileFormat.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

caPrivateKeyFileName.name: caPrivateKeyFileName
caPrivateKeyFileName.description: Private key, associated with the CA certificate that is used to sign the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificate. If the CA key file is password protected, the user is prompted to enter the pass phrase that was used to encrypt the key.
caPrivateKeyFileName.ai_hint: Private key, associated with the CA certificate that is used to sign the Intermediate-CA certificate or the end-user client and server certificate. If the CA key file is password protected, the user is prompted to enter the pass phrase that was used to encrypt the key.

caPrivateKeyFileFormat.name: caPrivateKeyFileFormat
caPrivateKeyFileFormat.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

privateKeyFileName.name: privateKeyFileName
privateKeyFileName.description: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.
privateKeyFileName.ai_hint: Name of and, optionally, path to the X509 certificate file that is used to form the certificate-key pair. /nsconfig/ssl/ is the default path.

caSerialFileNumber.name: caSerialFileNumber
caSerialFileNumber.description: Serial number file maintained for the CA certificate. This file contains the serial number of the next certificate to be issued or signed by the CA.
caSerialFileNumber.ai_hint: Serial number file maintained for the CA certificate. This file contains the serial number of the next certificate to be issued or signed by the CA.

privateKeyFormat.name: privateKeyFormat
privateKeyFormat.description: Format in which the key is stored on the appliance
privateKeyFormat.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: pempassphrase
options.description: Name for and, optionally, path to the private key. You can either use an existing RSA or DSA key that you own or create a new private key on the Netscaler ADC. This file is required only when creating a self-signed Root-CA certificate. The key file is stored in the /nsconfig/ssl directory by default.

options.name: pempassphrase
options.description: Name for and, optionally, path to the private key. You can either use an existing RSA or DSA key that you own or create a new private key on the Netscaler ADC. This file is required only when creating a self-signed Root-CA certificate. The key file is stored in the /nsconfig/ssl directory by default.

options.name: subjectaltname
options.description: Subject Alternative Name (SAN) is an extension to X.509 that allows various values to be associated with a security certificate using a subjectAltName field

options.name: days
options.description: Number of days for which the certificate will be valid, beginning with the time and day (system time) of creation

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

certificateKeyPairName.name: certificateKeyPairName
certificateKeyPairName.description: Name for the certificate and private-key pair
certificateKeyPairName.ai_hint: Name for the certificate and private-key pair

password.name: password
password.description: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange.
password.ai_hint: Input format of the certificate and the private-key files. The three formats supported by the appliance are: PEM - Privacy Enhanced Mail DER - Distinguished Encoding Rule PFX - Personal Information Exchange.

notifyExpiration.name: notifyExpiration
notifyExpiration.description: Whether to alert when the certificate is about to expire

notificationPeriod.name: notificationPeriod
notificationPeriod.description: Time, in number of days, before certificate expiration, at which to generate an alert that the certificate is about to expire
notificationPeriod.ai_hint: Time, in number of days, before certificate expiration, at which to generate an alert that the certificate is about to expire

certificateBundle.name: certificateBundle
certificateBundle.description: Whether to parse the certificate chain as a single file after linking the server certificate to its issuer's certificate within the file

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in
binaryProperty.ai_hint: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in

options.name: options
fileName
options.description: Name of the file. It should not include filepath.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name of the file. It should not include filepath.
fileName.ai_hint: Name of the file. It should not include filepath.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateFormat'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateType'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateRequestFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' AND certificateType IN ["INTM_CERT", "SRVR_CERT", "CLNT_CERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caCertificateFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' AND certificateType IN ["INTM_CERT", "SRVR_CERT", "CLNT_CERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caCertificateFileFormat'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' AND certificateType IN ["INTM_CERT", "SRVR_CERT", "CLNT_CERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caPrivateKeyFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' AND certificateType IN ["INTM_CERT", "SRVR_CERT", "CLNT_CERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caPrivateKeyFileFormat'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificate' AND certificateType == 'ROOT_CERT' THEN SHOW parameter 'privateKeyFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' AND certificateType IN ["INTM_CERT", "SRVR_CERT", "CLNT_CERT"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caSerialFileNumber'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' AND certificateType == 'ROOT_CERT' THEN SHOW parameter 'privateKeyFormat'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /certificateType == 'ROOT_CERT' THEN SHOW parameter 'pempassphrase'
IF /certificateType == 'ROOT_CERT' THEN HIDE parameter 'pempassphrase'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateKeyPairName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' THEN SHOW parameter 'privateKeyFileName'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateFormat'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' AND certificateFormat == 'PEM' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' THEN SHOW parameter 'notifyExpiration'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' AND notifyExpiration == True THEN SHOW parameter 'notificationPeriod'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'install' AND certificateFormat == 'PEM' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateBundle'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileLocation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation IN ["delete", "download"] AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileLocation'
IF operation IN ["delete", "download"] AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
